Articles.Content: Haven't done much in .22 yet, but like the feeling of desolation that is now evident on the island airfield, as well as the view from the island tower, though Jeb complained about how many stairs there were to climb. Personally, I also like that you can now recover a craft once it has landed without having to go back to the tracking station to do it. Neat touch.
Also new Astronaut Complex backround is beatiful and you can also hear some sounds while on Astronaut Complex. Even some talking if I remember correctly.
